Class NonUniformMutation

java.lang.Object
org.uma.jmetal.operator.mutation.impl.NonUniformMutation
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, MutationOperator<DoubleSolution>, Operator<DoubleSolution,​DoubleSolution>
public class NonUniformMutation
extends java.lang.Object
implements MutationOperator<DoubleSolution>
This class implements a non-uniform mutation operator.
Author:
Antonio J. Nebro , Juan J. Durillo
